doc.title: Pimpin on Empty
doc.plot: Kyle Sheppard's life was perfect. He had the hot girlfriend, the great NYC apartment and an upcoming promotion at his job. Everything was perfect, until his life is turned upside down when he discovers he achieved all this from his manipulative girlfriend's sexcapades with his married boss. Heartbroken, jobless and suddenly homeless. Kyle is talked into returning home to join the "Family Business" in order to save his Dad's life from a Poker debt to Big Al. Lead by his colorful con man father who lives by the motto "You can everything in life you want as long as you find someone willing to pay for it". Kyle and his idiot half brother, Vinny, embark on a hilarious journey through the world of womanizing in order to come up with enough money in time to save their father. There is only one problem, Vinny!
